label: SpecifiedDeclaration
comment: An act of notification by formal documentation or action, in any form prescribed or accepted, such as a self-declaration.

datatypeProperties.comment: A code specifying an assurance level of this specified declaration.
A textual description for the type of transportation waste recovery disposal process.
An issue date, time, date time or other date time value for this declared error.
A name or symbol, expressed as text, of a radioactive radionuclide.
A code specifying a subject type for this licence.
A code specifying a type of MDH health indication.

objectProperties.comment: A referenced standard associated to this specified licence.
A party that issues this specified declaration.
An object verified for this specified declaration.

referencedBy.comment: A specified declaration applicable to this production process.
